Package com.cafean.rpc

Class CallbackNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.rpc.AbstractRPCConnection
      • com.cafean.rpc.CallbackNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JobRPCCallbackNotifier
    public class CallbackNotifier
extends AbstractRPCConnection
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that manages a queue of responder (i.e. server) side callback notifications. Sub-classes may wish to override processMessage(com.apt.xdr.PibBlock) to customize the way notifications are delivered or queued.
    See Also:
    RPCResponder.createCallback(com.cafean.rpc.command.CallbackAuthorization, RPCResponder), RPCRequester.initializeCallback()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CallbackNotifier​(RPCResponder responder, java.net.Socket socket)
      Creates a new callback notifier to manager outgoing notifications for the given responder using the given socket.
      CallbackNotifier​(RPCResponder responder, java.net.Socket socket, java.util.Queue<PibBlock> queue)
      Creates a new callback notifier to manager outgoing notifications for the given responder using the given socket.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void initialize()
      Initializes the thread that manages the callback interface queue and the streams used to communicate with the callback responder on the remote end of the connection.
      void queueNotification​(PibBlock message)
      Adds the given message to the queue of notifications that will be sent via the callback interface

    • Constructor Detail

      • CallbackNotifier

        public CallbackNotifier​(RPCResponder responder,
                        java.net.Socket socket)
        Creates a new callback notifier to manager outgoing notifications for the given responder using the given socket. Notifications queued to be sent via queueNotification(com.apt.xdr.PibBlock) will be added to the given Queue and processed on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        responder - the RPCResponder parent of this callback notifier process
        socket - the Socket used to pass notifications to the client
        See Also:
        queueNotification(com.apt.xdr.PibBlock)

      • CallbackNotifier

        public CallbackNotifier​(RPCResponder responder,
                        java.net.Socket socket,
                        java.util.Queue<PibBlock> queue)
        Creates a new callback notifier to manager outgoing notifications for the given responder using the given socket. Notifications queued to be sent via queueNotification(com.apt.xdr.PibBlock) will be added to the given Queue and processed on a background thread.

        Note: Custom Queue implementations can be used to pioritize and/or coalesce outgoing messages.

        Parameters:
        responder - the RPCResponder parent of this callback notifier process
        socket - the Socket used to pass notifications to the client
        queue - the Queue<PibBlock> that will be used to hold queued notifications before they are sent to the client.
        See Also:
        queueNotification(com.apt.xdr.PibBlock)

        public void initialize()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the thread that manages the callback interface queue and the streams used to communicate with the callback responder on the remote end of the connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for errors resulting in stream setup
        See Also:
        AbstractRPCConnection.setupStreams()
